title: Ulysses S Grant National Historic Site: Field Trips
body: Field Trips      Plan A Field Trip Field trips to Ulysses S. Grant National Historic Site are a great way to engage students in learning about the past. A variety of ranger-led programs can be scheduled in advance or we can design something specific to meet your needs. There is no entrance fee to the site and all programs are offered free of charge. Choose from the By-Request Ranger Programs or contact the site's education director to discuss other options.
